title: To enquire about the launch of your new product of mobile phone - Google pixel 5 in India.
content:
Dear Sir/Ma'am/Team,
  Hope you are doing good and staying safe! :)
  I am writing this email in regards to enquire about the launch of your new product of mobile phone - Google pixel 5 in India.
  I am ecstatic to buy the same as I have heard great reviews and user experiences of the product. Please be informed that there are a lot of potential buyers who are waiting for the launch of the same in India.
  Yours sincerely,
Tushar Bhandari
